description: Parties that have ratified/acceded the Convention Concerning the Protection of the World Cultural and Natural Heritage (World Heritage Convention),  in the Americas as of January 2017. The Convention was adopted at the General Conference of the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) meeting at its seventeenth session in Paris, France on 16 November 1972 and entered into force on 17 December 1975.
name: CLME: World Heritage Convention Ratification Status
